meta.description: Determine the number of each type of ice cream machine to buy to minimize the total number of machines while meeting production and heat constraints.

sets.name: MACHINES
sets.description: Types of ice cream machines available for purchase.

params.name: production_capacity
params.description: Daily production capacity of each machine type in cones.

params.name: heat_output
params.description: Heat output of each machine type in units.

params.name: max_heat_output
params.description: Maximum allowable heat output per day.

params.name: min_cones_production
params.description: Minimum required production of cones per day.

vars.name: num_machines
vars.description: Number of each type of machine to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_machines
objective.description: Minimize the total number of machines purchased.

constraints.name: heat_constraint
constraints.description: Total heat output must not exceed the maximum allowable heat output.

constraints.name: production_constraint
constraints.description: Total production must meet or exceed the minimum required cones production.
